challenges.name: 7 Day Mental Detox
challenges.description:
7 days to reset your mind and reclaim mental clarity.

WHAT YOU'LL TRACK:

DAY 1:
ğŸ§  Brain Dump (60 min) - Write everything on your mind
ğŸ’ª Exercise (20+ min)
ğŸ˜´ Sleep Goal (8+ hours)
ğŸš« No Social Media
ğŸš« No Long-Form Content
ğŸ§˜ Detox Compliance

DAYS 2-7:
âœï¸ Freewriting (20 min on pen & paper)
ğŸ’ª Exercise (20+ min)
ğŸ˜´ Sleep Goal (8+ hours)
ğŸš« No Social Media
ğŸš« No Long-Form Content
ğŸ§˜ Detox Compliance

REPLACEMENT ACTIVITIES (encouraged):
Use the freed-up time for:
â€¢ ğŸ“º Light TV (comedy, feel-good shows)
â€¢ ğŸ“š High-quality books
â€¢ ğŸ’¼ Deep work blocks
â€¢ ğŸ‘¥ In-person social interaction
â€¢ ğŸ¨ Creative hobbies

BONUS RECOMMENDATIONS:
â€¢ Avoid alcohol, weed, other vices
â€¢ Get sunlight and movement daily
â€¢ Eat whole, real foods
â€¢ Journal your observations

WHY THIS WORKS:
Your brain is overstimulated. This detox creates space for clarity, focus, and genuine rest. The first 2-3 days are hardest - boredom is the goal. Let yourself be bored. That's when the reset happens.

Remember: You need 32/42 checkmarks to succeed (75%). That's 6 per day on average. Missing a few is OK - this is about progress, not perfection.

predetermined_activities.title: Brain Dump
predetermined_activities.description: Write everything on your mind for 60 minutes. Thoughts, worries, ideas, everything. Write without stopping, no structure needed.

predetermined_activities.title: Freewriting
predetermined_activities.description: Freewrite for 20 minutes on pen and paper. No structure, no editing, just flow.

predetermined_activities.title: Exercise
predetermined_activities.description: At least 20 minutes of physical movement. Walking, gym, yoga, sports - anything that gets you moving.

predetermined_activities.title: Sleep Goal
predetermined_activities.description: Get 8+ hours of quality sleep. Mark complete in the morning if you slept well.

predetermined_activities.title: No Social Media
predetermined_activities.description: Stay off Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms today. (Checking messages/DMs is OK if necessary, but no scrolling feeds)

predetermined_activities.title: No Long-Form Content
predetermined_activities.description: Avoid YouTube, podcasts, movies, TV shows, and news today. (Exception: Light comedy TV is OK as replacement activity)

predetermined_activities.title: Detox Compliance
predetermined_activities.description: Avoid other dopamine-heavy digital inputs today: doom-scrolling, gaming binges, rabbit-hole browsing, etc. Keep digital consumption intentional.
